chapters.title: Chapter 29: Memories of Saldaea
chapters.info: Teodora Kadere, p. 486 (344)—Sister to Hadnan Kadere. She taught him how to count, spell, read, etc. He killed her when she found out he was a Darkfriend; he always thinks of her now whenever he kills a woman. She grew up in Saldaea. See also Kadere, Hadnan.
